channel.title: How To?
channel.description: How do I make draynor village a safe zone without the rest of the area (varrock ect.) being safe zone as well? Please post a code, thanks.

item.title: How To?
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

Thank you so much.

Read full topic

item.title: How To?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Search for

public boolean nonWild()

Under it you should see this line

 if((absX >= 3091 && absX <= 3100 && absY >= 3507 && absY <= 3513) ||

After that || add this

(absX >= XXXX  && absX <= XXXX && absY >=YYYY  && absY <=YYYY )||

The X’s and Y’s are where you put your coords for the safe zone, if you don’t know where to start go to the southwest corner of draynor and type ::mypos, then take those two numbers and fill them in for the first XXXX and YYYY, then go up the to northeastern corner of draynor and type ::mypos, then take those numbers and replace the second XXXX and YYYY with them.

Read full topic
